mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.CBNO AS CBNO, A.CBSUBJECT AS CBSUBJECT, A.CBNAME AS CBNAME, A.CBCONTENT AS CBCONTENT, A.ACADEMY_ANO AS ACADEMY_ANO, A.MEMBER_MNO AS MEMBER_MNO, A.CDELETEYN AS CDELETEYN, TO_CHAR(A.CINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.CUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CUPDATEDATE, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.CBNO DESC)/#{pagesize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) PAGENO, COUNT(A.CBNO) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT, #{curpage, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CURPAGE, #{pagesize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS PAGESIZE, #{groupsize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS GROUPSIZE, #{pno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS PNO, B.ANO AS ANO, B.ANAME AS ANAME FROM CONSULTBOARD A, PAGING P, ACADEMY B WHERE CDELETEYN = 'N' AND PNO='P003' AND A.ACADEMY_ANO = B.ANO ORDER BY 1 DESC ) WHERE PAGENO=#{curpage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
